DIA_11302_Bodyguard_WhatIsGoingOn_03_02: I have to beat you up!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_WhatIsGoingOn_03_04: No, that's not how it was supposed to sound! Damn, it!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_WhatIsGoingOn_15_06: You want to beat up your boss?
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_TellMeAlready_03_02: How to explain it to you...
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_TellMeAlready_03_04: Let's just say I overheard my boss.
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_TellMeAlready_03_05: He said that living in Old Town is much safer than in other districts of the city.
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_TellMeAlready_03_06: He also said that spending gold on a bodyguard is an unnecessary expense here.
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_TellMeAlready_03_07: I need someone to help me make a scene so I don't lose my job!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_HaIAmInDanger_15_01: You want me to get beat up?
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_HaIAmInDanger_03_02: That's right! Of course, you'll get an appropriate reward for your sacrifice...
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_HaIAmInDanger_15_03: So what exactly am I supposed to do?
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_HaIAmInDanger_03_04: My boss often sits on the benches nearby.
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_HaIAmInDanger_03_05: I want you to sound threatening so that my boss gets scared.
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_HaIAmInDanger_03_06: And that's where I come in! I will defeat you and prove that someone like me is still needed!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_BeatMe_03_03: If all goes well, I'll be here waiting for you around midnight tomorrow.
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_FirstAmbient_03_01: Get out of here, or someone will get suspicious!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterFight_03_01: Ha! You've been defeated, you bandit!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterFight_03_02: Get out of my sight or I'll beat you again!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterFight_03_03: You lousy... Get out of here!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterFight_03_04: You son of a bitch! A whole bunch of them?!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_Ambient_03_01: You'll get your teeth kicked in!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterEvent_03_02: Now my boss thinks it's dangerous even here and my job is safe!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterEvent_03_05: That should be enough for you!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterEvent_03_06: What the hell was that? You were supposed to lose, not beat me!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterEvent_03_07: I didn't think you'd put anyone else in our arrangement...
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterEvent_03_08: But surprisingly, it didn't even hurt me!
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterEvent_03_09: The boss, after seeing me beaten on the ground, stated that he would additionally hire a second bodyguard.
DIA_11302_Bodyguard_AfterEvent_03_11: Hah! You deserve a kick in the ass! But take this and get out of my sight already!
